casebody.data:
State ex rel. Wellston City School Dist. Bd. of Edn.
v.
Ohio Facilities Constr. Comm. 2017-1709 Supreme Court of Ohio. May 24, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

In Mandamus. On notice of failure of settlement. Respondent shall file a response to the complaint within 21 days.
